content: amont the following options which one would you like me to implement? Add JSON/structured data processing capabilitiesImplement memory file versioning and updatesAdd memory search and retrieval commandsCreate memory templates for different context types

Among the options you've listed, "Add memory search and retrieval commands" could be particularly valuable. This feature would enhance the ability to quickly access and utilize stored information, improving efficiency and user experience. However, the best choice ultimately depends on your specific needs and priorities. If you frequently deal with structured data, then adding JSON/structured data processing capabilities might be more beneficial.
